title: Personal Finance wing
description: Dedicated to empowering members with essential personal finance skills, covering budgeting, saving, debt management, and introductory investment concepts. We aim to build a strong foundation for financial literacy and independence.
Activities include interactive workshops on creating budgets, understanding credit scores, exploring different savings vehicles, and demystifying basic investment options like mutual funds and ETFs.

title: Cryptocurrency and Trading wing
description: Focuses on understanding market dynamics, technical analysis, and various trading strategies across different asset classes like equities and derivatives. We explore market trends and risk management techniques.
Engage in simulated trading competitions, workshops on chart patterns and indicators, guest lectures from professional traders, and discussions on current market events.

title: Land and Corporate Revenue wing
description: Explores the financial decisions within corporations, including valuation, capital budgeting, M&A, and financial modeling. Also delves into the analytical and strategic aspects of finance consulting.
Participate in case study competitions, financial modeling bootcamps, valuation workshops, and networking sessions with professionals from investment banking and consulting firms.

title: Financial Literacy and Economic Inscription wing
description: Understand the core of being financial literacy and the crux of economics that unravel truths about society and monetary value.
Participate in case study competitions, financial modeling bootcamps, valuation workshops, and networking sessions with professionals from investment banking and consulting firms.
